import CreateAccountForm from './CreateAccountForm' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import Alert from 'react-bootstrap/Alert' const Pupup = (props: {closePopup: (type:string)=>void, addingUser: boolean, showMessage: boolean, message: {head: string, body: string}, sendCreateAccount: (data: {email: string, password: string, repeatPassword: string})=>void}) =>{ const sendCreateAccount = (data: {email: string, password: string, repeatPassword: string}) =>{ props.sendCreateAccount(data) } const closePopup = () => { props.closePopup('add') } return(
{props.addingUser ?
{props.showMessage && props.message.head !== "Success"? {props.message.head}

{props.message.body}

 : null }

wanna delet?
}
) } export default Pupup
